pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - NirvanaSprings Resort NirvanaSprings HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to NirvanaSprings Resort. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms. 1. Booking and Reservations All bookings and reservations made through our website are subject to availability and confirmation. We reserve the right to refuse any reservation at our discretion. Guests are required to provide accurate information when making a reservation. Any discrepancies may result in the cancellation of the booking. 2. Payment Terms All payments must be made in full at the time of booking unless otherwise specified. Accepted payment methods include credit/debit cards and other payment options as indicated on our website. In the event of a booking cancellation, the refund policy as outlined on our website will apply. 3. Cancellation and Refunds Cancellations made within the specified period will be subject to the terms and conditions of our refund policy. Please review our cancellation policy on the website for detailed information. No refunds will be issued for no-show or cancellations made after the specified period. 4. Guest Responsibilities Guests are responsible for their conduct during their stay. Any damage to property or disturbance caused will be charged to the guest’s account. Guests must comply with all house rules and regulations, as well as any local laws and regulations applicable during their stay. 5. Limitation of Liability NirvanaSprings Resort will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or services. Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law. We are not responsible for any third-party links or content on our website. 6. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, images, and logos, are the property of NirvanaSprings Resort and are protected by intellectual property laws. Unauthorized use of any content is prohibited. 7. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. Continued use of our website signifies your acceptance of the updated terms. NirvanaSprings website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
